title: Tray, 1953-143-16, First half of 19th century
provenance: Bought in Paris, Compagnie des Jndes in 1869; Gift of Mrs. Max Farrand
description: Four-lobed square form composed of flat base with slightly out-curved, raised scalloped rim; floor of tray and inner and outer rim decorated overall with conventionalized hammered floral motives.
